headline: IDEX Corporation Appoints Stephanie Disher and Matthijs Glastra to Board of Directors; David Parry and Livingston Satterthwaite to Retire
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., February 20, 2025--IDEX Corporation (NYSE: IEX) today announced the appointment of Stephanie ("Steph") Disher and Matthijs Glastra to the company’s Board of Directors. The appointments, effective Friday, February 21, 2025, increase the size of the Board from 10 to 12 directors. Ms. Disher will serve on the Board’s Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, and Mr. Glastra will serve on the Board’s Audit Committee.
